attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: Sets the progress bar into its indeterminate state.

attributes.name: progress
attributes.description: Sets the primary progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 100].

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description: Sets the progress bar into its indeterminate state.

properties.name: progress
properties.description: Sets the primary progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 100].

cssProperties.name: --zui-progress-color
cssProperties.description: Set the primary color of the progress bar

cssProperties.name: --zui-progress-duration
cssProperties.description: Set the progress bar animation duration
